title: MERN Stack Developer Intern ‚Äì Full Stack Web Apps
description:
**üíª MERN Stack Developer Intern ‚Äì Full Stack Web Apps \\| Virtual Internship \\| Flexible Timing \\| Real Industry Projects** 




 We‚Äôre accelerating our product engineering pipeline and onboarding execution\\-focused talent as
 **MERN Stack Developer Interns** 
 . This internship provides deep, hands\\-on exposure to
 **full\\-stack application development** 
 , covering everything from UI components to backend logic and database operations.
 



**Note:** 
 This is
 *not* 
 a stipend\\-based internship.\\*
 



**üîπ Internship Snapshot** 



* **Role:** 
 MERN Stack Developer Intern ‚Äì Full Stack Web Apps
* **Mode:** 
 100% Virtual Internship
* **Timing:** 
 Fully Flexible ‚Äî ideal for students managing academic workloads
* **Compensation:** 
 Unpaid; value delivered through real engineering project exposure
* **Eligibility:** 
 Students \\& freshers with foundational knowledge of MERN technologies



**üîπ What You Will Work On (Project Scope)** 




 Interns will build and deploy
 **real, industry\\-oriented full\\-stack applications** 
 , including:
 


* **Front\\-end:** 
 React components, state management, responsive UI
* **Back\\-end:** 
 Node.js \\& Express\\-based API development
* **Database:** 
 MongoDB schema design, queries, aggregation pipelines
* **Authentication \\& Authorization:** 
 JWT\\-based access workflows
* **Integration:** 
 Connecting APIs, UI, and databases into a cohesive system
* **Deployment simulations:** 
 Git workflows, hosting basics, environment variables



 These deliverables simulate real full\\-stack engineering environments.
 



**üîπ Core Responsibilities** 



* Develop modular, reusable full\\-stack features
* Build and integrate REST APIs
* Maintain clean, well\\-documented codebases
* Debug and optimize both frontend and backend components
* Collaborate with design and backend teams for seamless integration
* Deliver milestones aligned with sprint/project timelines
* Participate in code reviews and iteration cycles



**üîπ What You Gain** 



* End\\-to\\-end full\\-stack development experience
* Portfolio\\-ready applications showcasing complete MERN workflows
* Exposure to real engineering methodologies and best practices
* Flexible timings with output\\-driven expectations
* Completion certificate based on performance
* Strong readiness for full\\-stack and product engineering roles



**üîπ Ideal Candidate Profile** 



* Solid understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React
* Basic experience with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
* Strong problem\\-solving orientation
* Comfortable converting requirements into functional modules
* Ownership\\-driven, consistent, and detail\\-focused

title: Staff Software Engineer - Customer Focused
description:
If you are a sharp developer who likes to explore, investigate, and learn new things every day, this is the job for you!
 



  





 As a SW developer in the Customer Focus Group, you will get the opportunity to take part in the development of complex solutions for Check Point‚Äôs security platforms while diving into unfamiliar code with known issues, locate it, and design a code or architecture to overcome it. To achieve this, you will work collaborate with technical support engineers on production impacting cases while performing the code investigations.
 



  





 We are looking for ambitious, hardworking, innovative, self\\-motivated and quick learning SW developer to join our team.
 



  





**Major Responsibilities**



* Investigate and resolve complex, high\\-impact issues reported from production environments.
* Collaborate with TAC engineers to analyze problems in the field and develop software solutions.
* Write clean, reliable, and maintainable code for a variety of components across different products.
* Maintain high coding standards, including code reviews, testing, and documentation.
* Analyse system behavior and logs to identify performance bottlenecks and functional bugs.
* Contribute to ongoing efforts in improving the stability, performance, and supportability of the product.
* Propose and implement preventive improvements to reduce future occurrences of similar issues.



  





**Desired Background**



* BS/MS in CS/CE or similar field and a proven work experience as a Software Developer
* At least 8\\+ years of experience in C / C\\+\\+ development ‚Äì Mandatory
* Solid understanding of operating systems, memory management, concurrency, and multi\\-threading
* Strong knowledge of TCP/IP, networking protocols, and system\\-level programming
* Experience working in Linux/Unix environments
* Familiarity with debugging tools such as GDB, Valgrind, strace, and log analysis
* Ability to quickly understand large codebases and identify logical errors or inefficiencies
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work independently
* Good communication and interpersonal skills



  





**Advantages**



* Experience working on security or networking products
* Exposure to customer issues or work in production environments

title: ServiceNow AI Developer
description:
Position: ServiceNow AI Developer
   

  

 Exp: 4\\-10 Years
   

  

 Location: Hyderabad \\[Madhapur]
   

  

* Experience: 4‚Äì10 years (can consider 3 years if strong in AI concepts).
* Core Module: ITSM (mandatory base experience).
* AI Skills in ServiceNow:
+ Virtual Agent
+ Now Assist
+ NLU (Natural Language Understanding)
+ AG\\&T (Agentic AI concepts)
+ Incident summarization \\& custom AI use cases (e.g., summarizing knowledge articles).

* Integration Skills: General integration experience is also expected.
* Focus: Someone who understands how to use and customize ServiceNow AI features for end users and developers.


 We are looking for an experienced ServiceNow AI Developer/Consultant to design and implement intelligent workflows and AI\\-powered features within the ServiceNow platform. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in ServiceNow development, combined with experience or understanding of AI/ML technologies such as predictive intelligence, Now Assist, Virtual Agent, and Natural Language Understanding (NLU).
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Design and implement AI features in ServiceNow, including Virtual Agent, Predictive Intelligence, and NLU.
* Configure and customize ServiceNow modules like ITSM, CSM, HRSD, or FSM with AI\\-driven enhancements.
* Integrate external AI platforms or LLMs (e.g., OpenAI, Azure AI) into ServiceNow for advanced use cases.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to identify opportunities for AI automation and efficiency improvements.
* Set up and fine\\-tune Now Assist and related LLM\\-powered capabilities within the ServiceNow ecosystem.
* Develop and maintain Virtual Agent topics and decision trees using Flow Designer and topic blocks.
* Implement and train predictive models using ServiceNow's Predictive Intelligence.
* Create, manage, and test custom ML solutions within ServiceNow Studio or via APIs.
* Ensure high\\-quality documentation, test coverage, and governance of AI models and features.
* Stay updated with latest ServiceNow and AI trends, releases, and best practices.

title: IQE_INDORE_Hiring
description:
Playwright with Typescript, Service Automation, Selenium with Python, ETL testing, TOSCA Automation, Performance testing, Java SDET and DVOPS profile.
   

  

 A day in the life of an Infoscion
   

  

* As part of the Infosys consulting team, your primary role would be to actively aid the consulting team in different phases of the project including problem definition, effort estimation, diagnosis, solution generation and design and deployment
* You will explore the alternatives to the recommended solutions based on research that includes literature surveys, information available in public domains, vendor evaluation information, etc. and build POCs
* You will create requirement specifications from the business needs, define the to\\-be\\-processes and detailed functional designs based on requirements.
* You will support configuring solution requirements on the products; understand if any issues, diagnose the root\\-cause of such issues, seek clarifications, and then identify and shortlist solution alternatives
* You will also contribute to unit\\-level and organizational initiatives with an objective of providing high quality value adding solutions to customers. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you!A day in the life of an Infoscion
* As part of the Infosys testing team, your primary role would be to anchor testing requirements, develop test strategy, track \\& monitor project plans, review test plans, test cases and test scripts.
* You will develop project quality plans, validate defective prevention plans to deliver effective testing solutions for clients.
* You will ensure right test environment is available and provide necessary review feedback for test data setup to ensure timely commencement of test execution
* You will validate "go live" activities such as production verification to ensure that the application runs in the production environment without any issues.
* In addition, you will mentor the team and provide regular feedback and coaching to help them continually improve their performance If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you!

title: Lead Full Stack Engineer
description:
**Job Description**
**Job Title**
 Lead Full Stack Engineer
   

  

**The Purpose of This Role**
 As Lead ‚Äì Software Engineer, you will serve as a full\\-stack developer in the application development team of FCAT‚Äôs (Fidelity Center for Applied Technology) Green Meadows Project that focuses on delivering some intuitive trading experience in financial services domain. In the Green Meadows project, we design, build, and deploy features that benefit the user and the business. In this role you will be responsible for building software solutions using the MSA (Micro Services Architecture) on the cloud that interacts with various other downstream systems to deliver a seamless trading experience to the customer. You will work on all phases of projects, from design to deployment into production along with a team of full stack developers, DevOps engineers and other Software Engineers.
   

  

**The Value You Deliver**
* Designing and developing efficient code across programming languages
* Acting as a catalyst for improving other young engineers across the organization


**The Skills That Are Key To This Role**
**Technical / Behavioral**
* You have a strong background in developing backend applications, with a focus on Java, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, and Spring Security.
* You have experience in developing cloud\\-native applications and are proficient in building applications that run on the cloud.
* You have a comprehensive understanding of the entire software development process, which includes analysis, design, coding, testing, problem resolution, and planning.
* You are proficient in designing and developing RESTful web services and event\\-based systems.
* You have a solid understanding of RDBMS and writing SQL queries.
* You have experience working with messaging middleware such as Apache Kafka.
* You have experience in container\\-based deployments using Docker and Kubernetes for the runtime environment of the CI/CD system.
* You are actively participating in developing and delivering high\\-quality, timely, and sustainable software solutions within an Agile environment that aligns with both functional and non\\-functional business requirements.
* You have experience in implementing established Agile SCRUM practices effectively.
* You have a focus on software engineering excellence by embracing continuous integration, continuous deployment, and Acceptance Test Driven Development.
* You have to contribute and implement innovative solutions to enhance operational efficiency.
* You engage wholeheartedly with the team, fostering a collaborative and supportive environment as a valuable team member.
* You collaborate with Product managers, Design thinkers, and Creative designers in building solutions.


**The Skills that are Good to Have for this role**
* You have experience in front\\-end development, particularly with Angular.
* You have experience in the brokerage domain or proficiency in developing software for brokerage platforms.
* You have exposure to NoSQL databases like MongoDB, DynamoDB, and experience with distributed caching systems such as Redis.
* You have to demonstrate expertise in both the functional and technical aspects of the domain, with a willingness to expand knowledge in these areas.
* You have experience in optimizing database queries and fine\\-tuning query performance.
* You have to learn new concepts and technologies within strict deadlines.
* You have to stay updated on the latest IT blueprints, frameworks, and technologies to enhance productivity and benefit the organization.


**How Your Work Impacts The Organization**
 At Fidelity, we are focused on making our financial expertise broadly accessible and effective in helping people live the lives they want‚Äî from the 23 million people investing their life savings, to the 20,000 businesses managing their employee benefits programs, to the10,000 advisors and institutions needing innovative technology solutions to invest their clients‚Äô money. To do this well, as a privately held company, we place a high degree of value in nurturing a work environment that attracts the best talent and reflects our commitment to being an employer of choice.
   

  

 Underneath this stable and trusted brand is one of the most interesting innovation practices you have ever heard of \\- The Fidelity Center of Applied Technology (‚ÄòFCAT‚Äù). FCAT is a centralized function whose mandate is to catalyze innovation across the firm. Our FCAT teams prototype and pilot new businesses and capabilities that continue to distinguish our brand as the best customer experience in the financial services industry. These teams focus on exploring big industry game\\-changing technologies such as crypto currencies, artificial intelligence, virtual/augmented reality, \\& cloud computing. Additionally, FCAT‚Äôs world class research team identifies trends and works with partners across the innovation ecosystem to ‚Äúbring the outside in.‚Äù We collaborate with MIT, Harvard, Stanford and other academic institutions, and partner with Accelerators, Start Ups and other industry leaders to drive new ideas and innovation practices across the firm.
   

  

**The Expertise We‚Äôre Looking For**
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science or any other discipline
* 5\\+ years of IT experience


**Company Overview**
 Fidelity Investments is one of the world's largest providers of financial services. Headquartered in Boston, US, Fidelity's goal is to make financial expertise broadly accessible and effective in helping people live the lives they want. Privately held for nearly 70 years, Fidelity employs 45,000 associates who are focused on the long\\-term success of our customers. FMR (Fidelity Management \\& Research) India is the Global Inhouse Center of Fidelity Investments. Headquartered at Bangalore, where operations commenced in 2003, FMR India has another fully functional unit at Chennai. To know more visit:

title: Senior Software Developer ( Node.Js / Python )
description:
**Position Overview** 




 Join UnPay as a Backend Developer to power our core fintech infrastructure, focusing on robust, scalable services for payments, banking, and risk management. You'll dive deep into server\\-side logic, ensuring high availability, security, and performance for our Node.js/Express.js and Python\\-based systems. This role is pivotal for handling real\\-time transaction volumes while maintaining strict compliance.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop and maintain backend APIs for secure transaction processing and banking integrations using Node.js/Express.js and Python.
* Implement fault\\-tolerant designs for system routing and switching.
* Build and optimize queue systems using Redis, Kafka, or RabbitMQ for asynchronous task handling.
* Integrate AI risk assessment models into payment pipelines for real\\-time scoring.
* Design and query PostgreSQL databases for efficient data storage, auditing, and reporting.
* Ensure API security with GraphQL/REST, including rate limiting, JWT auth, and encryption.
* Automate deployments via Jenkins CI/CD, monitor performance with Grafana, and maintain code quality with SonarQube/Git.
* Troubleshoot and scale systems to handle 10K\\+ TPS (transactions per second).



  





**Required Qualifications** 



* Bachelor's in Computer Science or equivalent.
* **3\\+ years** 
 of backend development in scalable web applications.



  





**Preferred Skills** 



* Strong in Node.js/Express.js, Python (Flask/Django), PostgreSQL, message brokers (Redis/Kafka/RabbitMQ), GraphQL.
* Familiarity with microservices, event\\-driven architecture, and cloud\\-native tools.
* Soft Skills: Detail\\-oriented, collaborative, with a passion for clean, testable code.

title: CPQ Developers
description:
We are hiring for Salesforce CPQ Developers responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining Salesforce CPQ solutions to automate and optimize the quote\\-to\\-cash process. The ideal candidate will have hands\\-on experience in configuring and customizing Salesforce CPQ for complex pricing models, billing, contract management, amendments, discounting, and integration with OmniStudio.
 



  





 To Apply:
 



**Send your resume to kavitha@simpliigence.com/7483925904\\.** 




**Job Location: Bangalore/Remote.** 




**We prefer candidates with immediate notice period.** 




  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design and implement Salesforce CPQ solutions for pricing models, billing, contracts, amendments, and discounting workflows.
* Configure and customize CPQ modules including product configuration, pricing rules, quote templates, and contract lifecycle management.
* Develop and maintain integrations between Salesforce CPQ and external systems using REST/SOAP APIs, middleware, and OmniStudio components.
* Lead technical design and implementation of Quote\\-to\\-Cash solutions, including proof of concepts and prototypes.
* Optimize CPQ solutions for business needs, focusing on automation, process improvements, and best practices.
* Collaborate with business stakeholders, project teams, and global IT to recommend and implement technical solutions.
* Manage data migration, environment management, release management, and deployment methodologies.
* Document technical and functional solutions, present options to stakeholders, and ensure adherence to Salesforce best practices.
